title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node and browsers via fetch.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; supports generate, chat, pull, list, delete operations.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Convenient CLI wrapper for chatting, pulling, listing models with prompts history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama code completions and chat.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Minimal React chatbot example consuming Ollama via ollama-js.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Lightweight Alpine-based Docker image for Ollama with CUDA support.

title: ollama-nest
summary: NestJS module wrapping ollama-js for server-side injection.

title: ollama-kit
summary: Swift package for macOS/iOS apps to talk to local Ollama instances.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama REST API with Tokio/async support.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with chat, generate, embeddings and model management.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that chats using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-dagster
summary: Dagster integration providing Ollama resource for LLM steps in data pipelines.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated collection of Modelfile recipes for custom Ollama models.
